verses.roman:
nijābhīṣṭa kṛṣṇa-preṣṭha pācheta' lāgiyā
nirantara sevā kare antarmanā hañā

synonyms: nija-abhīṣṭa—one's own choice; kṛṣṇa-preṣṭha—the servitor of Kṛṣṇa; pācheta' lāgiyā—following; nirantara—twenty-four hours a day; sevā—service; kare—executes; antarmanā—within the mind; hañā—being.
translation: "Actually the inhabitants of Vṛndāvana are very dear to Kṛṣṇa. If one wants to engage in spontaneous loving service, he must follow the inhabitants of Vṛndāvana and constantly engage in devotional service within his mind.
